fields.name: Pancakes
fields.description: Fluffy, golden pancakes served with butter and warm maple syrup.

fields.name: French Toast
fields.description: Thick slices of brioche dipped in cinnamon-vanilla egg batter, griddled to perfection.

fields.name: Waffles
fields.description: Crisp on the outside, soft on the inside – our classic Belgian waffles come with syrup and butter.

fields.name: Omelette
fields.description: A hearty three-egg omelette filled with your choice of cheese, veggies, and meats.

fields.name: 2 Eggs & Bacon or Sausage
fields.description: Two farm-fresh eggs cooked your way, served with crispy bacon or savory sausage.

fields.name: Maple Oatmeal
fields.description: Warm and wholesome oats simmered with maple syrup, topped with brown sugar and cinnamon.

fields.name: Fruit Bowl
fields.description: A refreshing mix of seasonal fruits, perfect as a light breakfast or a sweet side.

fields.name: Grilled Chicken Sandwich
fields.description: Tender grilled chicken breast with lettuce, tomato, and mayo on a toasted bun.

fields.name: BLT Sandwich
fields.description: Crispy bacon, fresh lettuce, and juicy tomato layered between toasted bread with mayo.

fields.name: Ham and Swiss Sandwich
fields.description: Classic deli-style sandwich with smoked ham, Swiss cheese, and mustard on your choice of bread.

fields.name: Caesar Salad
fields.description: Crisp romaine lettuce tossed with creamy Caesar dressing, croutons, and parmesan cheese.

fields.name: CA Cobb Salad
fields.description: A vibrant mix of greens topped with grilled chicken, avocado, bacon, egg, tomato, and blue cheese crumbles.

fields.name: Spaghetti
fields.description: Classic spaghetti pasta served with savory marinara sauce and grated parmesan.

fields.name: Tomato Basil Soup
fields.description: Smooth, rich tomato soup infused with fresh basil — comfort in a bowl.

fields.name: Chicken Soup
fields.description: A hearty blend of tender chicken, vegetables, and noodles in warm, flavorful broth.

fields.name: Cheeseburger
fields.description: A juicy grilled beef patty topped with melted cheddar cheese, lettuce, tomato, pickles, and onions, served on a toasted bun with your choice of sauce.

fields.name: Filet Mignon
fields.description: A tender, premium-cut filet grilled to your liking, served with a side of seasonal vegetables.

fields.name: New York Strip Steak
fields.description: Juicy and flavorful, this classic steak is seared to perfection and paired with your choice of side.

fields.name: Grilled Salmon
fields.description: Wild-caught salmon grilled with a touch of lemon and herbs, served with roasted vegetables.

fields.name: Grilled Halibut
fields.description: Light and flaky halibut fillet grilled and served with a garlic butter glaze and fresh sides.

fields.name: Pasta Alfredo
fields.description: Creamy Alfredo sauce tossed with fettuccine pasta and topped with parmesan — rich and comforting.

fields.name: Pesto Penne
fields.description: Penne pasta tossed in house-made basil pesto with cherry tomatoes and grated cheese.

fields.name: Lamb Chops with Side Salad
fields.description: Succulent lamb chops seasoned and grilled, served with a fresh garden side salad.

fields.name: Lobster
fields.description: Succulent lobster tail meat, pan-seared in garlic herb butter, served with grilled asparagus and creamy mashed potatoes.

fields.name: Apple Walnut Salad
fields.description: Mixed greens with sliced apples, candied walnuts, blue cheese, and a light vinaigrette.
